output_files.description: 62 chunk definitions with metadata, summaries, tags, dependencies, calls, cross-references, and complexity ratings across 13 source files
Dependency graph with 62 nodes, 80 edges, 7 groups, and 9 external dependencies
Codebase statistics, token distribution, complexity assessment, 10 key patterns, 6 verification items, and cross-file dependencies
This file — execution metadata and quality metrics
Handoff document for DOC-SQL-001 with recommended documentation order, sub-chunking guidance, and cross-references

chunking_strategy.rationale: 13 source files chunked by semantic boundaries: SqlServer.c by execution phase (9 chunks), SqlHandlers.c by handler/template grouping (8 chunks), ElectronicPr.c by 2xxx/5xxx transaction family (12 chunks), DigitalRx.c by 6xxx transaction family (7 chunks), MessageFuncs.c by utility function domain (13 chunks), MacODBC_MyOperators.c by operator section (6 chunks), supporting files as individual chunks (7 chunks).

quality_metrics.gap_lines: Inter-function whitespace, comment separators, and file boundaries — no functional code is missed
quality_metrics.chunks_below_minimum: 7 (all headers or small supporting files — justified by semantic distinctness)
quality_metrics.chunks_above_maximum: 10 (all monolithic handler functions — flagged NEEDS_SUB_CHUNKING where appropriate)

research_inputs_used: RESEARCH/SqlServer_deepdive.md — Researcher agent deep dive with file inventory and architecture analysis
RESEARCH/MacODBC_deepdive.md — MacODBC architecture and include-injection pattern
CHUNKS/FatherProcess/repository.json — Schema reference for chunk format
CHUNKS/MacODBC/repository.json — Schema reference with sub-chunking example

parallel_agents_used.purpose: Map 265 operator case definitions across 8418 lines
